naslov: OBITELJSKA KUĆA S VRTOM I GARAŽOM NA PANTOVČAKU (prodaja)
Lokacija: Grad Zagreb, Gornji Grad - Medveščak, Britanac
opis: Prodaje se kuća stambene površine 250 m2 koju je potrebno renovirati, na odličnoj lokaciji u blizini trgovine i javnog prijevoza. Kuća se sastoji od podruma, prizemlja i 1.kata. Podrum 45m2: 2 prazne prostorije s prozorima u suterenu, vešeraj Prizemlje 105m2: ulazni hodnik, dnevni boravak, blagavaonica, kuhinja, kupaonica, spremište, WC, 1 spavaća soba 1.kat 100m2: 1 spavaća soba, dnevni boravak, zatvorena terasa s drugom spavaćom sobom, WC U ravnom vrtu površine 540 m2 nalazi se garaža za 1 automobil. Više detalja na upit! --- FAMILY HOUSE WITH GARDEN AND GARAGE IN PANTOVČAK A house for sale with a living area of 250 m2 that needs to be renovated, in an excellent location near shops and public transport. The house consists of a basement, ground floor and first floor. Basement 45m2: 2 empty rooms with windows in the basement, laundry room Ground floor 105m2: entrance hall, living room, dining room, kitchen, bathroom, storage room, toilet, 1 bedroom 1st floor 100m2: 1 bedroom, living room, closed terrace with another bedroom, WC In the flat garden of 540 m2 there is a garage for 1 car. More details on request! ---
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Kneza Branimira 29, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
